page.title: 04SPORTS CENTRE,EARLS COLNE
page.content: The Earls Colne Recreation club as built in 1979 but the Sports Centre was built 2 years later in 1981. the Recreation club has an upstairs room used for meetings,dinners and a funroom .The sports centre has 2 badminton courts, 2 squash courts ,2 table tennis courts and{ 4 outside tennis courts.The sports centre was paid for by W.A.Hunt.This year the Recreation club was made better by building an upstairs room as well as an extra downstairs room.The upstairs room is a kind of fun room because they have moved the pool table and dartboard upstairs.In the downstairs room there is a fruit machine,a television and new furniture.
